course: ^Camilla: It doesn't help. It doesn't.. Nothing helps. Can you help me? Nothing helps!
Help: ^Camilla: I don't know. I think I'm lost. I think I need help.
new: ^Camilla: I don't want another. I just want it to be over. I just want to be over. I'm sorry, I do. I'm not even sure who I am anymore.
newChoices: ^You're Camilla, and I can help you.
^Just come in, let's work through it together.
alright: ^Camilla: I don't.. I don't think so. I'm not sure, I've just been wandering. I think I'm lost but I'm not sure. I'm looking for something. I'm looking for...
Comein: ^Camilla enters. She's frail and constantly looking around for something that doesn't exist. She takes the pill you hand her and immediately swallows it. You better do your best today.
